Name: Attack of the Mechadonk - The ultimate donkey
About the game: DEVELOPER INFORMATION Mechadonk Media is an indie developer consisting of one guy and a passion for games. Attack of the Mechadonk was developed during the 2020 lockdown as a hobby and a opportunity to learn Unity. THE GAME He is fifty hands high and made of aluminium. From the depths of space comes MECHADONK. In this exciting retro style SHMUP. Can you defeat the first line of defense to clear the way for the full scale invasion. Inspired by the game, Attack of the mutant camels by Jeff Minter. Traditional Side scrolling beat your high score shoot'em up made for fun. Featuring: - Four unique drawn levels - One exciting boss fight - Traditional style POWER-UPS - retro style soundtrack and SFX. - Lives / Health / Shields Thanks for taking the time to read and I hope you enjoy this fun title.
